summary: Hazari, is my first mod, I plan to Continuously Update him and improve him as i go and as i learn. He is located in The drunken Huntsman
descriptionHtml:
Hazari, is my first mod, I plan to Continuously Update him and improve him as i go and as i learn. He is located in The drunken Huntsman.

I would love help on this mod.

Plans for the future:
